languages.text: "Рекомендую не считаться с потерями среди мирного населения. Хороший урок боли и страха им на пользу".
"I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."
languages.original_text: "Рекомендую не считаться с потерями среди мирного населения. Хороший урок боли и страха им на пользу".

traits.locale_text: "I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."
"I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."
"I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."
"I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."
"I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."
"I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."

languages.text: "Ich empfehle, auf zivile Verluste keine Rücksicht zu nehmen. Diese Leute brauchen ein Lektion in Sachen Schmerz und Furcht."
languages.original_text: "I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."

traits.locale_text: "Ich empfehle, auf zivile Verluste keine Rücksicht zu nehmen. Diese Leute brauchen ein Lektion in Sachen Schmerz und Furcht."

languages.text: « Je vous recommande de ne pas tenir compte des pertes civiles. Ces gens ont grand besoin d'apprendre le sens des mots "peur" et "douleur". »
languages.original_text: "I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous recommande de ne pas tenir compte des pertes civiles. Ces gens ont grand besoin d'apprendre le sens des mots "peur" et "douleur". »

languages.text: «Le recomiendo que no se preocupe por las bajas civiles. Esta gente necesita imperiosamente una lección a base de dolor y miedo».
languages.original_text: "I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."

traits.locale_text: «Le recomiendo que no se preocupe por las bajas civiles. Esta gente necesita imperiosamente una lección a base de dolor y miedo».

languages.text: “我的建议是：根本没必要考虑平民伤亡，这些人就该在痛苦与恐惧之中好好吸取教训。”
languages.original_text: "I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."

traits.locale_text: “我的建议是：根本没必要考虑平民伤亡，这些人就该在痛苦与恐惧之中好好吸取教训。”

languages.text: 「民間人の被害は気にせず行動することを勧めるよ。この人たちには、痛みと恐怖というしっかりとした教訓が必要だ」
languages.original_text: "I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."

traits.locale_text: 「民間人の被害は気にせず行動することを勧めるよ。この人たちには、痛みと恐怖というしっかりとした教訓が必要だ」

languages.text: "Sivil kayıpları göz önünde bulundurmamanı öneriyorum. Bu insanların acı ve korkuyla harmanlanmış sağlam bir derse ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "I recommend not taking civilian casualties into account. These people are in need of a good lesson in pain and fear."

traits.locale_text: "Sivil kayıpları göz önünde bulundurmamanı öneriyorum. Bu insanların acı ve korkuyla harmanlanmış sağlam bir derse ihtiyacı var."
